studyName: The Genomics and Randomized Trials Network (GARNET) Vitamin Intervention Stroke Prevention (VISP) Trial

rules.rationale: Metabolomics_ScaledImputed_Pheno_DS (931 vars) contains scaled, imputed metabolite values: metabolite_1 through metabolite_117+ with RUN_DAY and METABOLOMICS_CENTER metadata. Single mass-spectrometry platform output.

ECG table (34 vars) from the VISP stroke prevention trial. Variables ECG2-ECG24 with sub-items (ECG4A-D, ECG22A-B) represent standardized ECG readings. Note: ALLDTI sounds like DTI brain imaging but actually contains dietary variables (DIETFLG, DSF1-DSF15) â€” a naming trap.
